backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining data types, authorization mixin, persistent maps, and CRUD-style query/update functions for profiles, NNS data, finances, bets, tasks, habits, and lightweight plans.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old plannings into new lightweight plans and producing a NewActor state with updated plan data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking PlanningTab redesign and React Query updates to specific frontend files and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing component roles, styling, and behaviors across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables and base styles supporting light/dark modes and consistent UI surfaces.
frontend/index.html: PWA-optimized HTML entry point with iOS-specific meta tags and the root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing authentication, profile loading, theme provider setup, and rendering the dashboard or login flow.
Main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, theme toggle, logout, and dynamic tab rendering including the planning tab.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving user name and optional email using a profile mutation with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/tabs/FinancesTab: Tab for listing bills and managing add, edit, and payment actions with dialog forms and summary data.
frontend/src/components/tabs/HabitTracke: Tab to view habits, add new habits, and increment progress with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/tabs/HorseBetsTa: Tab displaying horse bets and stats with a dialog to add new bets including amount, odds, and win status.
frontend/src/components/tabs/NNSProgress: Tab showing NNS staked ICP and maturity data with dialogs to update state and maturity values.
frontend/src/components/tabs/PlanningTab: Tab for creating, selecting, editing, and deleting plans with support for notes and external links.
frontend/src/components/tabs/TodoListTab: Renders a task list with dialogs for adding tasks and actions for completing them using query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, NNS data, bills, tasks, and other backend entities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with light/dark theme CSS variables and global layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen with a button to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, features, issues, and architectural notes for ongoing planning work.
